comments:

This happens when I select the ViewPart entry.

Ensured NPE cannot be thrown and reprioritized error messages so that "Project
must be a Plugin Project to use a view..."  is shown instead of "Project is not
a java project..." which will make sure the user knows a view is only for a
plug-in and not for a plain java project.

Released patch to peter for HEAD, will close when confirmed.
